name: The Ceres Catalyst
description:
Desktop build recommended for a smoother experience with better graphic, although WebGL should be fine (if there are any input issues in browser, try going fullscreen)

------------------------------

Global Game Jam Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/mycelia-2

------------------------------
With the ongoing cryo-eruption of Ahuna Dome on the dwarf planet Ceres, an immense movement of micro bacterial fungi has influenced the mycelial network, a largely unknown collection of multidimensional roots which connects various points in spacetime.

With this as a catalyst, an experiment takes place to harness the opportunity...

------------------------------
This game was a solo effort by myself made for Global Game Jam 2023, which had the theme "Roots." I didn't have the full time so there isn't much in the way of gameplay, so I instead tried to polish up a short and sweet experience, with inspiration from Valve's Source games. The only thing not made in the jam was the song that plays on the radio (Gas Station Hotdog), but I did still make that. Overall I think I pulled it off!
